title: Bug 6536 - Add Javadoc on field in Type Hierarchy does not work
description: When attempting to add Javadoc on a field in the Type Hierarchy view, the expected action does not occur. There are no error messages or indications of any kind that the action has been performed.
OB: When selecting a field in the Type Hierarchy view and choosing the 'Add Javadoc' option from the context menu, no action is taken. The field's Javadoc is not added or modified in any way.
EB: The 'Add Javadoc' option in the context menu should add or modify the Javadoc for the selected field in the Type Hierarchy view, providing a convenient and efficient way to document the field.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open the Type Hierarchy view. 2. Select a field within the view. 3. Right-click on the selected field to open the context menu. 4. Choose the 'Add Javadoc' option from the context menu.
